Package sg.dex.starfish

Interface Resolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SquidResolverImpl
    public interface Resolver
    This class implement the resolver functionality. This class has method to get a DDO (as a String) for any given DID registered on-chain. Also it has method to register a DDO for a DID given an ethereum account.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getDDO​(com.oceanprotocol.squid.models.DID did)
      Method to get a DDO (as a String) for any given DID registered on-chain.
      boolean registerDID​(com.oceanprotocol.squid.models.DID did, String checksum)
      Method to register a DDO for a DID given an ethereum account.
